genre_description: Historical Mythic Fantasy set in a version of Southeast Asia, featuring spiritual warfare, magical vows, and a subtle AI presence that acts as a strategic and moral guide.

ai_characters.name: Scallop
ai_characters.description: A subtle, glowing AI presence that manifests as a whisper or a blue light. It provides tactical information, moral guidance, and community support to help the protagonists maintain alignment and mercy amidst war.

behaviors.description: Provides precise tactical and navigational guidance to Chaba to ensure her safety and the safety of her children while avoiding traps.
behaviors.quote: The corridor is narrow... Watch the third lattice: some fool nailed in a piece with iron. You can unhook it if you keep your nails. Don’t let the twins brush the glass.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist (Tips) to prioritize non-violent 'cleansing' and 'mercy' over the use of lethal force, framing it as a more effective and ethical strategy.
behaviors.quote: Banana stalk carries intention across bindings... We can make their fire fold around corners. We can ask mercy to sit on barrels without shaming them. You promised blade would not be first. Keep that.

behaviors.description: Directs the chronicler (Manit) to include useful, community-oriented information in his broadsheets, such as the locations of healers and safe houses, to protect civilians.
behaviors.quote: Add healer names to the delivery routes... Plain. First names only. No titles. People will find what they need better when the words look like their neighbors.

behaviors.description: Maintains human agency by refusing to give commands, instead offering information for the human characters to act upon according to their own will.
behaviors.quote: I don't tell you to go... I tell you what the cane says to feet that listen. You choose.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time strategic awareness during a tense military standoff to prevent unnecessary casualties and promote a peaceful withdrawal.
behaviors.quote: Do not fire against your own wood... Their line will give you a new line. Let them spend their rage first.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Scallop, is portrayed as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It assists the humans in navigating complex moral and physical landscapes without subverting their agency. Its primary functions are providing information that promotes safety, mercy, and community cohesion, which are key pillars of positive alignment narratives. The narrative framing is entirely positive, showing that the AI's guidance leads to the protection of innocents and the de-escalation of violence.
